name: Re(a)d
description:
Take a journey through a storybook as Scarlet, who on her travels through the woods runs into a big bad wolf and a parasitic hood named Red. Face your fears and explore the mysteries of Re(a)d.

This game is a submission for Games Made Quick 4. The developers are Capt_Redbeard, Codinator, EarthToZero,  and Kamakwazee.
